title: Ethereum, XRP Sink While Bitcoin Holds: What's Going On With Altcoins?
description: Major altcoins led by Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) and Ripple‘s XRP (CRYPTO: XRP) posted sharp declines on Thursday, reversing gains from a strong rally earlier...
